thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 20 of 99
thread.title: Benjamin

author: Benjamin
title: Benjamin
text:
Speaking from my own experience with ssense.
All I can say is they always continue to deliver excellence. From free on time 2 day delivery to always having what I'm looking for in stock. Their annual sale is a great one! Worth the wait. I would like to see discounts and promo perhaps even a free membership? Other than that I know it will get better with time. Ssense always delivers.
